input.sentences: i was loved the basketball tournament !
each of us had a temporary tattoo painted on our hands !
those cartoons the artist drew of us were hilarious .

output.sentences: Everyone at the tournament loves watching basketball.
Fans could even have a temporary tattoo painted on their own.
There was an artist who drew hilarious cartoons.
Players were available to sign posters.
Lots of fans bought shirts from the tournament.
